channel.title: Messing with Code So You Don’t Have To
channel.description: Recent content on Messing with Code So You Don’t Have To

item.title: Watch Dogs: Torrent Peer Threat Intel for Bulgaria
item.description: Monitor torrent peers, enrich IPs with multiple intel sources, and visualize risk on a live map with advanced analytics.

item.title: Reverse Engineering an ANJIA AJ-L73PA1250 PTZ IP Camera
item.description: A technical reverse-engineering analysis of a low-cost PTZ IP camera, including UART access, firmware extraction, and undocumented backdoors.
